<Abu'l-Hasan Ali ibn al-Furat
3:
--------------------
Text: Abu'l-Hasan Ali ibn al-Furat:  He played an important role in the selection of al-Muqtadir as caliph in 908, going on to serve as vizier in 908–912, during which time he succeeded in re-incorporating Fars into the Caliphate and to restore a measure of authority over the Sajids of Adharbayjan.
